assertions.title: Strong authentication methods are enabled for data platform access
assertions.rationale: Strong authentication prevents unauthorized access to sensitive data platforms and ensures only authorized users can access data resources.

assertions.title: Role-based access control is implemented with least privilege principles
assertions.rationale: RBAC implementation ensures users only have access to data resources they need for their job functions, reducing the risk of data exposure.

assertions.title: Service accounts are securely managed with proper credential rotation
assertions.rationale: Secure service account management prevents unauthorized access through compromised credentials and ensures proper access controls for automated systems.

assertions.title: Multi-factor authentication is enforced for all data platform access
assertions.rationale: MFA significantly reduces the risk of unauthorized access to sensitive data platforms even if credentials are compromised.

assertions.title: Data encryption at rest is enabled for all stored data using customer-managed keys
assertions.rationale: Encryption at rest protects sensitive data from unauthorized access even if storage systems are compromised, with customer-managed keys providing additional control.

assertions.title: TLS/SSL encryption in transit is enforced for all data communications
assertions.rationale: Encryption in transit prevents interception of data communications and protects sensitive information during transmission between systems.

assertions.title: Encryption key management implements secure lifecycle controls
assertions.rationale: Secure key management ensures encryption keys are properly protected, rotated, and controlled throughout their lifecycle.

assertions.title: Column-level encryption is implemented for sensitive data fields
assertions.rationale: Column-level encryption provides fine-grained protection for sensitive data fields while maintaining query performance for non-sensitive data.

assertions.title: Field-level encryption is implemented for individual data fields
assertions.rationale: Field-level encryption provides the highest level of granular data protection with separate keys for each sensitive field.

assertions.title: Tokenization is implemented for sensitive data replacement
assertions.rationale: Tokenization replaces sensitive data with tokens while maintaining referential integrity, reducing the risk of data exposure.

assertions.title: Automatic data classification is enabled for sensitivity level detection
assertions.rationale: Automatic data classification ensures appropriate security controls are applied based on data sensitivity and business impact.

assertions.title: PII protection controls are implemented for personally identifiable information
assertions.rationale: PII protection ensures personally identifiable information receives special protection and controls to comply with privacy regulations.

assertions.title: Data anonymization techniques are implemented for privacy protection
assertions.rationale: Data anonymization protects privacy while enabling data analysis and sharing for legitimate business purposes.

assertions.title: Dynamic data masking is enabled for non-production environments
assertions.rationale: Data masking protects sensitive data in non-production environments while enabling development and testing activities.

assertions.title: Row-level security is enforced for multi-tenant data access
assertions.rationale: Row-level security ensures users can only access data rows they are authorized to see, providing strong multi-tenant isolation.

assertions.title: Column-level permissions are implemented for sensitive data fields
assertions.rationale: Column-level permissions provide fine-grained access control for sensitive data fields, ensuring users only see data they are authorized to access.

assertions.title: Query governance controls are implemented for data access validation
assertions.rationale: Query governance controls prevent unauthorized data access and ensure queries comply with security policies and resource limits.

assertions.title: Comprehensive audit logging is enabled for all data access and queries
assertions.rationale: Comprehensive audit logging provides visibility into all data access activities and supports compliance and security investigations.

assertions.title: Real-time data access monitoring is enabled for suspicious activity detection
assertions.rationale: Real-time data access monitoring enables early detection of suspicious activities and potential security threats.

assertions.title: AI-powered anomaly detection is enabled for data access patterns
assertions.rationale: AI-powered anomaly detection identifies unusual data access patterns that may indicate security threats or policy violations.

assertions.title: Network isolation is implemented using VPCs and private networks
assertions.rationale: Network isolation prevents unauthorized access to data services and provides additional security layers through network segmentation.

assertions.title: Private endpoints are configured for secure data service access
assertions.rationale: Private endpoints ensure data services are not exposed to the public internet, reducing attack surface and improving security.

assertions.title: Data lineage tracking is enabled for comprehensive data flow monitoring
assertions.rationale: Data lineage tracking provides visibility into data flow and transformations, supporting compliance and data quality management.

assertions.title: Data quality controls are implemented for data integrity validation
assertions.rationale: Data quality controls ensure data integrity and reliability, supporting accurate business decisions and compliance requirements.

assertions.title: Automated data retention policies are enforced based on regulatory requirements
assertions.rationale: Automated data retention policies ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and reduce data storage costs while maintaining data availability.

assertions.title: Data catalog security implements access controls and metadata protection
assertions.rationale: Data catalog security ensures sensitive metadata and data asset information is protected from unauthorized access.

assertions.title: GDPR compliance controls are implemented for data protection
assertions.rationale: GDPR compliance ensures data protection and privacy rights for EU data subjects, avoiding regulatory penalties and maintaining trust.

assertions.title: HIPAA compliance controls are implemented for healthcare data protection
assertions.rationale: HIPAA compliance ensures protection of protected health information (PHI) and meets healthcare industry regulatory requirements.

assertions.title: SOX compliance controls are implemented for financial data protection
assertions.rationale: SOX compliance ensures financial data integrity and meets Sarbanes-Oxley Act requirements for public companies.

assertions.title: Comprehensive data backup strategy is implemented for all data assets
assertions.rationale: Comprehensive backup strategy ensures data availability and business continuity in case of system failures or data loss.

assertions.title: Multi-region disaster recovery is implemented for business continuity
assertions.rationale: Multi-region disaster recovery ensures data services remain available during regional outages or disasters.

assertions.title: Point-in-time recovery capability is enabled for data restoration
assertions.rationale: Point-in-time recovery enables restoration of data to specific points in time, supporting data recovery and compliance requirements.

assertions.title: Immutable backups are implemented for ransomware protection
assertions.rationale: Immutable backups protect against ransomware attacks and ensure backup data cannot be tampered with or deleted.

assertions.title: API security is implemented for data service access control
assertions.rationale: API security prevents unauthorized access to data services through APIs and ensures proper authentication and authorization.

assertions.title: ETL security controls are implemented for data processing pipelines
assertions.rationale: ETL security controls ensure data integrity and security during extract, transform, and load processes.

assertions.title: Data pipeline security is implemented for processing workflows
assertions.rationale: Data pipeline security ensures data processing workflows are secure and monitored for potential security issues.

assertions.title: Third-party security controls are implemented for external data providers
assertions.rationale: Third-party security controls ensure external data providers meet security standards and protect shared data assets.

assertions.title: Data warehouse access controls are implemented with proper authentication and authorization
assertions.rationale: Data warehouse access controls ensure only authorized users can access and query sensitive data warehouse resources.

assertions.title: Query performance monitoring is enabled with resource limits and optimization
assertions.rationale: Query performance monitoring prevents resource abuse and ensures optimal data warehouse performance while maintaining security.

assertions.title: Data lake access controls are implemented for secure data storage and retrieval
assertions.rationale: Data lake access controls ensure secure storage and retrieval of data while maintaining proper governance and classification.

assertions.title: Secure data sharing controls are implemented for external data sharing
assertions.rationale: Secure data sharing controls prevent unauthorized data exposure while enabling legitimate business data sharing.

assertions.title: Data pipeline orchestration implements secure workflow management
assertions.rationale: Pipeline orchestration security ensures data processing workflows are secure and monitored for potential issues.

assertions.title: Homomorphic encryption is implemented for secure computation on encrypted data
assertions.rationale: Homomorphic encryption enables secure computation on encrypted data without exposing sensitive information.

assertions.title: End-to-end encryption is implemented from data source to destination
assertions.rationale: End-to-end encryption ensures data remains encrypted throughout its entire lifecycle from source to destination.

assertions.title: Privacy by design principles are integrated into data platform architecture
assertions.rationale: Privacy by design ensures data protection and privacy are built into the platform architecture from the ground up.

assertions.title: Dynamic data masking is implemented for real-time data protection
assertions.rationale: Dynamic data masking provides real-time protection of sensitive data based on user access levels and context.

assertions.title: Query monitoring and analysis is enabled for security and performance tracking
assertions.rationale: Query monitoring enables detection of suspicious query patterns and ensures optimal data platform performance.

assertions.title: Automated compliance reporting is enabled for regulatory requirements
assertions.rationale: Automated compliance reporting ensures timely and accurate reporting for regulatory requirements and audits.

assertions.title: Network firewall rules are implemented for data platform access control
assertions.rationale: Network firewall rules provide additional security layer by controlling network access to data platforms.

assertions.title: DDoS protection is implemented for data platform availability
assertions.rationale: DDoS protection ensures data platform availability during distributed denial of service attacks.

assertions.title: Data ownership is properly assigned and managed for all data assets
assertions.rationale: Data ownership ensures accountability and proper management of data assets throughout their lifecycle.

assertions.title: Data breach response procedures are implemented and tested
assertions.rationale: Data breach response procedures ensure rapid and effective response to security incidents involving data assets.

assertions.title: PCI DSS compliance controls are implemented for payment card data protection
assertions.rationale: PCI DSS compliance ensures protection of payment card data and meets industry security standards.

assertions.title: CCPA compliance controls are implemented for consumer privacy protection
assertions.rationale: CCPA compliance ensures consumer privacy rights are protected and California privacy law requirements are met.

assertions.title: Backup testing and integrity validation is performed regularly
assertions.rationale: Backup testing ensures data recovery capabilities are functional and backup integrity is maintained.

assertions.title: External data connections are secured with proper authentication and encryption
assertions.rationale: Secure external connections prevent unauthorized access to data platforms through external integrations.

assertions.title: Data validation and integrity checks are implemented for all data flows
assertions.rationale: Data validation ensures data integrity and quality throughout integration processes and data flows.
